alert.note: Alert for Rutherford; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:17PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Rutherford and east central Williamson Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 517 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Smyrna, or 10 miles northwest of Murfreesboro, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Smyrna, La Vergne, Nolensville, Walterhill, Lascassas and Rockvale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 between mile markers 65 and 84. Interstate 840 between mile markers 45 and 64. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
